name: Multi-Cloud Solutions
description:
Multi-Cloud is a key technical enabler supporting Goal 1 of the DoD's Software Modernization Strategy.

This technique is inclusive of providing solutions that span cloud providers, leveraging best of breed capabilities in support of the DoD mission, and from hyperscale to the tactical edge.

name: Kubernetes (k8s)
description: Inclusive of CNCF Kubernetes & Rancher RKE2 in addition to managed offerings like AKS and ARO.

name: Legacy Windows Auth Apps in Windows Containers
